name: Adobe Creative Cloud
description: Adobe Creative Cloud is a comprehensive suite of creative applications including Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, Premiere Pro, and more, designed for designers, photographers, videographers, and other creative professionals. It enables seamless workflows across desktop and mobile apps with cloud storage and collaborative features.
features: Industry-standard apps like Photoshop, Illustrator, and Premiere Pro
Access to Adobe Fonts and Adobe Stock library

name: Airtable
description: Airtable is a flexible spreadsheet-database hybrid that helps teams organize workflows, project plans, and content calendars. With a variety of views (Grid, Calendar, Kanban, Gallery) and powerful automation, Airtable bridges the gap between a simple spreadsheet and a full-fledged database.
features: Multiple view types (Grid, Calendar, Kanban, Gallery)
Collaboration with comments and revision history

name: Asana
description: Asana is a leading work management platform that helps teams track tasks, manage projects, and collaborate efficiently. With features like timelines, boards, and workload views, Asana offers a centralized place for planning, tracking, and reporting across any team.

name: AWeber
description: AWeber is an email marketing and automation platform designed to help small businesses and entrepreneurs build email lists, send newsletters, and create automated campaigns. It provides an intuitive drag-and-drop email builder, responsive templates, and detailed analytics.
features: Analytics dashboard with open and click-through rates

name: Basecamp
description: Basecamp is an all-in-one project management and team collaboration tool that includes message boards, to-dos, schedules, docs, file storage, and group chat. It’s designed to simplify communication and keep teams aligned on priorities.
features: Message boards and real-time group chat (Campfire)
Docs & Files storage with version history

name: BigCommerce
description: BigCommerce is a scalable e-commerce platform that enables online merchants to create and manage professional storefronts. With built-in SEO tools, customizable templates, and a wide range of payment gateways, BigCommerce caters to both small businesses and large enterprises.
features: User-friendly store builder with responsive themes
Multiple payment gateways without transaction fees

name: Buffer
description: Buffer is a social media management platform that simplifies scheduling, publishing, and analyzing posts across multiple social channels. It offers intuitive analytics, team collaboration tools, and a drag-and-drop calendar to plan campaigns effectively.

name: Calendly
description: Calendly is an automated scheduling tool that helps individuals and teams set their availability and share booking links with clients, customers, or colleagues. It eliminates back-and-forth emails by syncing with calendars and handling time zone differences automatically.
features: Syncs with Google, Outlook, and iCloud calendars

name: ChatGPT
description: ChatGPT by OpenAI is an advanced conversational AI model capable of understanding and generating human-like text. It can be used for drafting emails, writing code, creating content, tutoring, and even brainstorming ideas in real time.
features: Supports natural language understanding and generation
Continuously updated with new data and improvements

name: ClickUp
description: ClickUp is an all-in-one productivity platform that merges tasks, docs, goals, chat, and time tracking into a single app. It is designed to replace multiple workplace tools by providing customizable workflows, real-time collaboration, and robust reporting.
features: Built-in time tracking and Goals feature
Integrations with Slack, GitHub, Google Drive, and more

name: Constant Contact
description: Constant Contact is an email marketing service that offers easy-to-use tools for creating branded emails, social media advertisements, and personalized marketing campaigns. It includes list-building features, event marketing, and robust analytics.
features: Drag-and-drop email editor with responsive templates
Real-time reporting on opens, clicks, and social shares

name: ConvertKit
description: ConvertKit is an email marketing platform specifically built for creators—bloggers, podcasters, and course creators. It provides simple automations, landing pages, and subscriber tagging to help you grow and monetize your audience.
features: Visual automation builder for subscriber journeys
Integration with WordPress, Shopify, and more

name: Dropbox
description: Dropbox is a cloud storage and file-sharing platform that allows individuals and teams to store files securely, synchronize content across devices, and collaborate in real time. Features include file versioning, smart sync, and integration with Microsoft Office Online.
features: Automatic file sync across desktop and mobile
Smart Sync to save space on local drives
Integration with Microsoft Office and Slack

name: Evernote
description: Evernote is a note-taking and organization application that helps you capture ideas, clip web content, and store files in a unified workspace. With notebooks, tags, and powerful search, Evernote keeps your documents and ideas accessible across all devices.
features: Rich text editing with attachments (images, audio)
Notebooks, stacks, and tags for organization

name: Facebook Ads Manager
description: Facebook Ads Manager is the advertising platform by Meta that allows you to create, manage, and analyze ad campaigns across Facebook and Instagram. It provides targeting options, A/B testing, and performance insights to optimize ad spend and reach.
features: Detailed audience targeting and lookalike audiences
A/B testing (Split Testing) for creatives and copy
Integration with Instagram and Messenger ads

name: Gmail
description: Gmail is Google’s free, robust email service that provides a clean interface, powerful search, spam protection, and seamless integration with other Google Workspace apps such as Drive and Calendar. It’s widely used by individuals and teams for professional communication.
features: Integration with Google Drive and Google Docs
Customizable filters, labels, and keyboard shortcuts

name: Google Analytics
description: Google Analytics is a web analytics service offered by Google that tracks and reports website traffic. It provides insights on user behavior, acquisition sources, conversion funnels, and e-commerce performance, helping you make data-driven decisions.
features: Behavior flow and user journey visualization

name: Google Drive
description: Google Drive is a cloud storage service by Google that lets you store files securely, share them with others, and access them from any device. It integrates seamlessly with Google Docs, Sheets, and Slides for real-time collaboration.
features: 15 GB of free storage with upgrade options
Real-time collaboration on Docs, Sheets, and Slides
Advanced search with OCR for images and PDFs
Offline access and file syncing across devices

name: HubSpot
description: HubSpot offers an all-in-one inbound marketing, sales, and customer service platform. With tools for CRM, email marketing, social media scheduling, and analytics, HubSpot helps businesses attract visitors, convert leads, and close customers.
features: Free CRM with contact management and deal tracking

name: Mailchimp
description: Mailchimp is a leading email marketing and marketing automation platform that helps businesses create, send, and analyze email campaigns. It offers customizable templates, audience segmentation, A/B testing, and built-in landing pages.
features: Drag-and-drop email builder with responsive templates
Automation workflows for onboarding and re-engagement
Built-in landing page and form builder

name: Notion
description: Notion is an all-in-one workspace that combines notes, tasks, databases, and wikis. It allows individuals and teams to create custom workflows, share documents, and keep track of projects using highly flexible building blocks.
features: Block-based editor for notes, databases, and boards
Custom templates for workflows, roadmaps, and wikis
Real-time collaboration with comments and mentions

name: Postman
description: Postman is a powerful API development environment used by developers to design, test, document, and monitor APIs. It simplifies collaboration with collections, environments, and automated test scripts to ensure your API endpoints work perfectly.
features: Interactive API request builder with syntax highlighting
Automated testing with built-in test scripts
Collaboration with shared collections and workspaces

name: QuickBooks Self-Employed
description: QuickBooks Self-Employed is an accounting software designed for freelancers, contractors, and sole proprietors. It helps track income and expenses, estimate quarterly taxes, and separate business and personal finances to streamline tax season.
features: Quarterly tax estimation and filing reminders
Integration with TurboTax for seamless filing
Separate business and personal income categorization

name: Skype
description: Skype is a long-standing VoIP service that enables free video and voice calls worldwide, along with instant messaging and file sharing. It supports group video calls, screen sharing, and affordable calling rates to landlines and mobiles.
features: HD video calls and voice calls
Screen sharing and group video conferencing
Free instant messaging with emojis and GIFs

name: Slack
description: Slack is a real-time messaging and collaboration platform designed for teams. It offers channels, direct messages, file sharing, and extensive app integrations (Google Drive, Trello, Zoom), making it easy to centralize communication.
features: Direct messages, group DMs, and voice/video calls
Integration with hundreds of third-party apps
Searchable message archive with advanced filters

name: Shopify
description: Shopify is an all-in-one e-commerce platform that allows merchants to create online stores, process payments, and manage inventory. With customizable themes, built-in SEO, and 24/7 support, Shopify is used by businesses ranging from solo entrepreneurs to large enterprises.
features: Customizable store themes with drag-and-drop builder
Secure payment processing with Shopify Payments
App Store with thousands of integrations

name: SurveyMonkey
description: SurveyMonkey is a powerful survey creation tool that helps businesses and individuals collect feedback, conduct market research, and analyze results. It offers customizable templates, drag-and-drop question types, and advanced reporting features.
features: Branching logic and customizable question types
Integration with Salesforce, Mailchimp, and more

name: Trello
description: Trello is a visual project management tool that uses boards, lists, and cards to help teams organize tasks and workflows. With features like Checklists, Power-Ups (integrations), and automations (Butler), Trello simplifies project tracking from start to finish.
features: Customizable Power-Ups for Calendar, Slack, Google Drive
Team collaboration with comments and mentions

name: Typeform
description: Typeform is an online form and survey builder known for its engaging, conversational user experience. It offers customizable templates, conditional logic, and integrations with tools like Google Sheets and Zapier, making it ideal for lead generation and feedback collection.
features: Integrations with CRMs, Google Sheets, Zapier

name: Wave
description: Wave is a free, cloud-based accounting software for small businesses and freelancers. It provides tools for invoicing, accounting, and receipt scanning. Wave is known for its simple interface and zero monthly fees, making it ideal for solopreneurs and micro-businesses.
features: Payroll and payroll tax services (paid add-on)

name: WooCommerce
description: WooCommerce is an open-source e-commerce plugin for WordPress that transforms any WordPress site into a fully functional online store. With extensive customization options, themes, and extensions, WooCommerce is suitable for both small shops and large-scale online businesses.
features: Built-in payment processing and shipping options
Extensions for subscriptions, memberships, and bookings

name: Zapier
description: Zapier is an automation platform that connects your favorite apps (Over 5,000 integrations) to automate repetitive tasks. With Zaps (workflows) you can move data between apps automatically, set up triggers, and apply filters without writing any code.
features: Multi-step Zaps with filters and formatting

name: Zoho
description: Zoho provides a suite of cloud-based business applications including CRM, Mail, Books (invoicing), Projects, and more. Zoho’s integrated ecosystem helps small to medium-sized businesses manage their operations, sales, marketing, and finance all in one place.
features: Zoho Books for accounting and invoicing
Zoho Projects for task and project tracking
Integration across Zoho ecosystem and third-party apps

name: Zoom
description: Zoom is a leading video conferencing platform offering HD video and audio meetings, webinars, and chat functionality. It’s widely used by businesses, educators, and individuals for virtual collaboration, remote work, and online events.

name: Fiverr
description: Fiverr is the world’s largest freelance services marketplace, where beginners can create “gigs” (services) in minutes and connect with buyers from around the globe. With Fiverr, you get an instant storefront, seamless payment processing, and access to a global audience without any upfront fees.
features: Instantly create gigs with zero setup cost

name: Canva
description: Canva is a cloud-based graphic design platform that makes it easy for anyone—beginners and professionals alike—to create stunning visuals for social media, presentations, marketing materials, and more. With its drag-and-drop editor and thousands of templates, you can produce professional designs in minutes.
features: Access to millions of stock photos, icons, and fonts
Real-time team collaboration and brand kits
Background remover and Magic Resize (Pro feature)

name: Grammarly
description: Grammarly is an AI-powered writing assistant that helps you write clear, mistake-free content. It checks for grammar, punctuation, style, and tone, making it ideal for freelancers, students, and professionals who want to improve their writing.

name: Karasomes
description: Karasomes is a Germany-based online marketplace offering smart home gadgets, minimalist decor, and sustainable lifestyle products – perfect for freelancers, digital nomads, and modern households.
features: Fast shipping within Germany and Austria
Affordable solutions for renters, students, and freelancers

name: Embea
description: Embea is a modern insurance provider offering digital, hassle-free coverage for families, freelancers, and individuals in Germany. From life insurance to accident protection, Embea simplifies your safety.
features: Digital life and accident insurance within minutes
Tailored for freelancers, parents, and remote workers

name: Amberscript
description: Amberscript is an AI-powered transcription and subtitling tool that turns audio and video into accurate text. Perfect for freelancers, content creators, and remote professionals who work with interviews, podcasts, or educational content.

name: Ergofino
description: Ergofino offers high-quality, ergonomic office furniture including height-adjustable desks and chairs. Ideal for remote workers, freelancers, and anyone looking to improve their home office setup with comfortable and health-focused furniture.

name: Babbel
description: Babbel is a top-rated language learning app offering 14 languages with interactive lessons, speech recognition, and mobile access. It's perfect for freelancers, digital nomads, and remote workers looking to upskill or learn new languages.
features: 14 languages including English, Spanish, French, and Russian
Interactive lessons with vocabulary, grammar, and listening
Speech recognition technology for better pronunciation
Mobile and desktop sync with cloud-based progress tracking
Free first lesson and 20-day money-back guarantee

name: FYRST
description: FYRST is a digital bank designed specifically for freelancers and self-employed professionals in Germany. It offers business banking, invoicing, accounting integrations, and a fully digital setup with no paperwork.
features: Business accounts tailored for freelancers & founders
Online banking with modern UX and mobile access
Free plan available with essential features

name: Pack & Smooch
description: Pack & Smooch creates handmade accessories for remote workers, including wool felt laptop sleeves, leather desk pads, and minimalist gear designed in Germany.
features: Handmade laptop sleeves from wool felt and leather
Minimalist desk accessories for stylish home offices
Perfect gift idea for freelancers and remote workers

name: lingoking
description: lingoking is a certified translation and interpreting platform offering document, legal, business, and real-time language services. Ideal for individuals and global businesses needing secure, professional language solutions.
features: Transparent fixed pricing and fast turnaround

name: SpeedComfort
shortDescription: Effiziente Heizkörperlüfter zur Reduzierung der Heizkosten und Optimierung der Raumtemperatur.

name: Evaneos
description: Evaneos connects travelers with local experts to plan authentic, tailor-made journeys worldwide. Ideal for freelancers and digital nomads seeking deeper travel experiences.
features: Plan trips with local travel agents

name: BuddySIM
description: BuddySIM is the ultimate solution for travelers who want hassle-free mobile data in over 100 countries. With prepaid SIMs and eSIMs, you can stay connected worldwide without roaming fees or complicated contracts.
features: eSIM and physical SIMs for global data
Perfect for freelancers and digital nomads

name: ESET
description: ESET provides award-winning antivirus and internet security solutions trusted by freelancers, digital nomads, and remote teams. Its lightweight, fast, and reliable protection works seamlessly across all devices, keeping your online work safe and secure.
features: Minimal system impact for better productivity

name: Reisefux
description: Reisefux offers luxury hotel deals at unbeatable prices across Germany and Austria. Perfect for remote workers and digital freelancers who want a spontaneous getaway or a workation retreat without breaking the bank.
features: Handpicked luxury hotels with major discounts
No booking fees or hidden costs
Perfect for short breaks and digital detoxes

name: Ottonova
description: Ottonova is Germany’s first digital private health insurer built for freelancers, remote workers, and startups—offering fast online enrollment, german-speaking support, telemedicine, and modern coverage options.
features: Digital claims and billing via app

name: Dentolo
description: Dentolo is a modern dental insurance provider in Germany, offering freelancers and self-employed professionals simple, affordable coverage with fast reimbursements and transparent pricing.
features: Flexible and affordable dental insurance plans
Coverage for dental cleanings, braces, implants and more
Special plans tailored for freelancers and families

name: WellCard
description: WellCard is a flexible health and wellness discount card accepted across Germany, offering up to 30% savings at thousands of wellness providers — including dentists, physiotherapists, massage studios, gyms, and more. Ideal for freelancers looking to stay healthy without breaking the bank.
features: Up to 30% discounts on health & wellness services
Valid at 15,000+ partner providers in Germany
Covers dental, massage, physiotherapy, and more

name: SKR Reisen
description: SKR Reisen offers authentic, small-group travel experiences ideal for remote workers and freelancers. With a focus on sustainability, culture, and coworking-friendly setups, it's the perfect way to blend productivity with adventure.
features: Small group trips with max 12 guests
Flexible schedules with free time for work

name: Geek Crate
description: Geek Crate is a monthly subscription box for fans of anime, games, comics, and sci-fi—perfect for freelancers who want fun, creative energy delivered to their door.
features: Curated monthly boxes with unique geek culture items
Includes apparel, figures, gadgets, snacks & more
Flexible plans with gift options and global shipping
Perfect for remote workers looking for joy and surprise

name: Reise Sim Karten
description: Reise Sim Karten DE offers affordable, high-speed data SIM cards for travelers, freelancers, and remote workers who need reliable mobile internet access across Europe and beyond.
features: Affordable bundles for freelancers and digital nomads
cta: Stay connected with Reise Sim Karten

name: Cupper Teas
description: Cupper Teas offers organic, fairtrade, and naturally flavored teas that support wellness and clarity—perfect for remote workers and mindful freelancers.
features: Naturally flavored with no artificial ingredients
Boosts focus, relaxation, and energy for freelancers

name: AXA Versicherungen
description: AXA is one of Germany’s leading insurance providers, offering comprehensive protection for freelancers, digital nomads, and remote teams—from health to liability to travel insurance.
features: Flexible insurance plans tailored to self-employed professionals
Comprehensive health and travel insurance packages
Liability and legal coverage for digital workers
Award-winning customer service and online claims support

name: goneo
description: goneo is a reliable German hosting provider offering webspace, domains, email, and powerful tools tailored for freelancers, bloggers, and small businesses.
features: Email hosting with strong spam filters

name: easyname
description: easyname is a European domain and hosting provider offering simple, fast, and affordable solutions—perfect for freelancers and small businesses who want a reliable online presence.
features: Easy-to-use control panel for hosting and DNS

name: DepositDirect
description: DepositDirect helps renters in Germany reduce upfront costs by offering deposit-free living. Instead of paying a large rental deposit, tenants pay a small monthly fee while DepositDirect guarantees the security deposit to landlords.

name: rapidmail
description: rapidmail is a powerful German email marketing solution designed for small businesses, freelancers, and agencies. It enables easy newsletter creation, automation, and GDPR-compliant email campaigns with intuitive tools and professional templates.
features: High deliverability and support in German

name: simpleshow
description: simpleshow is a powerful explainer video tool that turns your complex ideas into simple, animated videos — perfect for freelancers, educators, and remote teams.
features: Professional templates for business, education, and training

name: Dogado
description: Dogado is a reliable German hosting provider offering scalable cloud, VPS, domain, and email services tailored for freelancers and small businesses.

name: Phase-6
description: Phase-6 is Germany’s leading vocabulary trainer designed for students, freelancers, and language learners. Ideal for remote workers, digital nomads, and families focused on language acquisition and skill-building.
features: Smart vocabulary training based on scientifically proven methods
Works offline – perfect for digital nomads and remote workers
Integrated with top textbooks and language courses
Apps for iOS, Android, and Web

name: Ohne-Makler.de
description: Ohne-Makler is a German real estate platform that lets you sell or rent your property without using an agent. Ideal for freelancers and remote workers managing their own listings and saving on commission fees.
features: Syndicates to ImmoScout24, Immowelt, and more
Perfect for digital nomads managing homes remotely

name: 1blu
description: 1blu is a German hosting and domain provider offering reliable, secure, and affordable web services tailored for freelancers, bloggers, and small businesses.
features: Web hosting with easy one-click installations

name: fraenk
description: fraenk is the mobile plan made for digital natives, freelancers, and remote workers in Germany—offering a simple, contract-free mobile experience with 5G access and full transparency.
features: Flat rate for calls, texts, and data in Germany

name: AmericanDream DE
description: The AmericanDream Green Card service helps remote workers and freelancers apply legally for U.S. permanent residency through the official Green Card Lottery.

name: Duden Learnattack
description: Duden Learnattack is an online learning platform from Germany's trusted Duden brand, offering high-quality support in subjects like German, Math, and English. Ideal for students, parents, and freelancers pursuing further education.
features: Covers core subjects from grade 4 to 13
Learning plans tailored to school curriculum

name: Verivox
description: Verivox is a leading comparison portal in Germany that helps users save money by comparing prices for electricity, gas, internet, insurance, and more. It’s a valuable resource for freelancers and remote workers looking to cut unnecessary expenses and optimize their monthly costs.
features: Compare electricity, gas, internet, and mobile providers
Switch providers directly through the platform
Smart tools to estimate potential savings
Personalized tariff suggestions based on your profile

name: Lichtblock
description: Lichtblock offers premium blue light blockers and red light therapy products that help freelancers and remote workers improve sleep, focus, and overall well-being.
features: Scientifically designed red light therapy lamps
Premium blue light blocking glasses for deep sleep
Perfect for night-shift workers and screen-heavy routines
Trusted by biohackers and wellness professionals

name: PAPERLY Poster
description: PAPERLY offers customizable, minimalist wall art designed to add personality and inspiration to any remote work or home office setup.
features: Personalized poster designs for any occasion
Perfect for home offices, coworking setups, and gifts

name: DRAKENSBERG
description: DRAKENSBERG creates premium vintage-style travel gear and accessories designed for explorers, freelancers, and digital nomads on the move.
features: Handcrafted leather travel bags with a vintage aesthetic
Designed for slow travel, coworking trips, and creative journeys
Durable materials ideal for long-term digital nomads
Eco-conscious production using natural raw materials

name: Bewerbermappe
description: Bewerbermappe helps job seekers and freelancers create professional, modern CVs, cover letters, and full job application documents in just a few clicks.
features: Easy-to-use CV and cover letter builder
Professional templates for freelancers and employees
Instant export as PDF or Word
